timeline.bodyText: I would restore previous code formatting. Here and elsewhere.
timeline.author: kokosing

replies.bodyText:
we usually write them on one line elsewhere.
(btw otherwise this would be 3 lines)
replies.author: findepi

replies.bodyText:
ok, "usually" is an overstatement. "often" is more proper. It's actually a pretty even mix today.
anyway, i feel like cascading this doesn't increase readability.
it does help when we bind instance (not class) and the binding stanza would be too long for one line.
Here it's not.
replies.author: findepi
